divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my suv at night looking out window that was down I saw a very large ufo ligjt ip light green all the way down all over on the side I could see of it. It was solid looking an was like a straigjt line buy wife then it turned off its lights it was moving when it turned on irs lights. I've seen a lot of ufos and I'm scared.
